text: David John King (24 October 1940 – 16 July 2010) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward in the Football League for Hull City, and in non-League football for King's Lynn. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Kingston upon Hull Category:Footballers from the East Riding of Yorkshire Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Hull City A.F.C. players Category:King's Lynn F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Dave King (footballer, born 1940)
